Package com.evite.qv.webservice

Login:

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
QVWebService This is the interface of the evite web service gateway (for Quickvite, but generic enough to be reused).
 

Class Summary
QVWebServiceImpl QVWebserviceImpl provides functionality for creating/retrieving Quickvite-type events.
 

Package com.evite.qv.webservice Description

Login: 

// log in
String userId = service.login(credentials,
        "user@host.com",
        "password",
        handsetUniqueId);
check login (returns userId if logged in, null otherwise) 
String userId = service.checkLogin(credentials, uniqueId);
Logout: 
service.logout(credentials, uniqueId);
To create an event: 
QVCredentials credentials = new QVCredentials("myClientId", "myClientKey");

QVEvent event = new QVEvent();
event.setTitle("my event");
event.setStartTime(myStartDateTime);
event.setEndTime(myEndDateTime);
event.setHostMessage("This my event, come and attend please");
event.setLocationName("Evite office");
event.setStreet("8833 W Sunset Blvd");
event.setCity("Los Angeles");
event.setState("CA");
event.setPostalpre("90069");

// this would have been obtained by a login or checkLogin call before
event.setHostUserId(hostUserId);

// the group ids would have been obtained earlier by a retrieveGroups call
List groupIdsForInvitees = new ArrayList(2);
groupIdsForInvitees.add(group1Id);
groupIdsForInvitees.add(group2Id);

// create the event (this can throw an ErrorCode.NOT_VERIFIED type exception if the host has no verified mobile #)
QVEventDecorator eventDecorator = service.createEventForGroups(credentials, event, groupIdsForInvitees);

// this is the resultant event and guestlist
QVEvent savedEvent = eventDecorator.getEvent();
List savedInvites = eventDecorator.getGuestList();
To retrieve upcoming events: 
// this will return invite decorator (invite info + some event info) for anything past the handset's date
List upcoming = service
        .retrieveUpcomingInvites(credentials, userId, handsetNowDate);
Update invitation viewed date/status: 
service.updateInviteViewedStatus(credentials, inviteId);
RSVP to an invitation: 
service.rsvpToInvite(credentials, inviteId, Response.YES, "I'm looking forward to it!");
Uploading a photo: 
byte[] imageData = ...;
QVPhoto photo = service.uploadPhoto(credentials, eventId, photoOwnerUserId, imageData);
